notes.title: Funding
notes.p: This project is funded by the Ministry of Research and Innovation within Program 1—Development of the national RD system, Subprogram 1.2—Institutional Performance—RDI excellence funding projects, Contract no. 34PFE/19.10.2018. The EU ERASMUS+ program is acknowledged for supporting teaching and research stays for M.O.G. and for P.A.P. in Romania and Germany, respectively (RO IASI 02). The WATERS Synapt G2S mass spectrometer was bought with an EU grant [EFRE-UHROM 9] made available to M.O.G.
